name: cognicity-rem-server
description: Web & data server for CogniCity REM
author: Tomas Holderness

scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run mocha
scripts.jshint: jshint config.js server.js Cap.js CognicityServer.js Database.js Validation.js test/test-config.js test/testCap.js test/testDatabase.js test/testServer.js test/testCognicityServer.js test/testValidation.js
scripts.build-docs: jsdoc -d docs package.json config.js server.js Cap.js CognicityServer.js Database.js Validation.js
scripts.build: npm test && npm run build-docs && npm run coverage
